featured.text: The organization believes that people may be motivated to buy elephant-friendly brands when they know more about the risk tea can pose to these endangered animals.
Motivated by such signs of success, thousands of kids from the villages surrounding Bekoji have moved into town.

definition.en_def: To provide someone with a reason or incentive to do something.
definition.example: The coach tried to motivate the players to give their best during the game.
